name: ec2-hostname
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Sets hostname and FQDN of the node.

= REQUIREMENTS:

= ATTRIBUTES:

set_fqdn - FQDN to set

= USAGE:

recipes.ec2-hostname: Set hostname and FQDN of the node.
recipes.ec2-hostname::ec2_set_hosts: Set init script - modify hosts file at boot time.
